: : Lunekill : :

The powerful femmebot looks to her brother.

Lunekill: If you feel you are up to it now. Should we attack the Maximals first, as we planned, or hunt down these two?


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Dreadplague transforms and soon, a large winged beast leaves the 
canopy of the trees. She flies out as fast as she can.

Rockseeker, on the other hand, is ready to go on.

Rockseeker: Let's resume, shall we, Sister?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : DeathStar/Lunekill : :
> 
> DeathStar transformes and heads out with Dreadplague. He sees the 
odd activity around Dread though.
> 
> "What the?" He thinks, but decides to worry about it later.
> 
> Lunekill smirks as the Tripreds  retreat.
> 
> Lunekill: That's quite alright worms, I'll kill you all later.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: This is for fans of Vampire:The Masquerade. Remember 
> Obtenebration?
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Unbeknownst even to her, Dreadplague had unconsciously developed a 
> new power. As she heard Deathstar, she went out of hiding. The very 
> shadows around her seemed to deepen and to move along with her. She 
> was under the tree canopy, running for her life, while tendrils of 
> pure darkness extended, ready to act if the necessity arose.
> 
> Dreadplague: Move Deathstar! We have to get going! Take off!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Lunekill/DeathStar : :
> > 
> > Lunekill watched Dread go down, and the cloaking start.
> > 
> > Lunekill: What the?
> > 
> > Just then DeathStar finished collecting data.
> > 
> > DeathStar: Dread, are you ok? We can pull back!
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > The huge winged beast fell to the ground after being hit once 
again.
> > Dreadplague transformed in her cloaked robot mode and went under 
> the 
> > cover of a low rocky formation, barely able to fit there.
> > 
> > Something was happening. She seemed to make the shadow move 
around 
> > her. What was going on?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > : : Lunekill : :
> > > 
> > > Lunekill clenched her optics tight, hsaking her head. She could 
> > feel the emotion penetrating her mental circuits. This one had 
> > telepathic abilities. With an effor, Lunekill locked out her head 
> > from Dread and reconcentrated her fire.
> > > 
> > > Lunekill: Well that was interesting. Not many Cybertronians 
have 
> > that power...
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Dreadplague was hit bad, but she tried to soak as much as she 
> > could. 
> > > She had to give Deathstar the time to collect data. She had to 
> > fight 
> > > back.
> > > 
> > > Focus as hard as she could, she sent total terror into 
Lunekill. 
> > She 
> > > was not sure the other was going to fall prey to it, but she 
had 
> to 
> > > try.
> > >

> > wrote:

> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar took a scanner from subspace and started to collect 
> the 
> > > data on these minions.
> > > > 
> > > > Lunekill was quite annoyed by the shrieking sound and 
extended 
> > her 
> > > other arm. Now energy bolts were coming from both hands, 
shooting 
> > at 
> > > Dreadplague. Some of the shots missed, striking and destroying 
a 
> > > mountain in the distance.(OOC: DBZ style)

> > > >

> Fell 
> > > > Beast mode and made her way over the shot. That was not 
> supposed 
> > to 
> > > > happen. They were not even in range to be discovered yet, as 
> they 
> > > > were still in relative radar cover.
> > > > 
> > > > Dreadplague: Deathstar! Get the data! I'll distract them!
> > > > 
> > > > She tried to get Lunekill's attention by shrieking as harshly 
> as 
> > > she 
> > > > could. 
> > > > 
> > > > Rockseeker, stayed behind. He was still worn out from the 
> surge, 
> > > but 
> > > > he observed.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > : : DeathStar/Lunekill : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > DeathStar is quite happy to learn that Dreadplague wishes 
to 
> > > become 
> > > > his student.
> > > > > 
> > > > > DeathStar: It would be an honor...
> > > > > 
> > > > > Then DeathStar comes into visual contact with the Minions.
> > > > > 
> > > > > DeathStar: Well, Dread, there is the source of those 
signals. 
> > Do 
> > > > you want to observe them or introduce ourselves?
> > > > > 
> > > > > Lunekill was about to fly off when she caught sight of the 
> > > incoming 
> > > > Tripredacus.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Lunekill: Curiosity killed the Cybertronians.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Lunekill extends her arm, her long, claw like finger tips 
> > > glowing. 
> > > > She unleases several unknown energy blasts at Dreadplague and 
> > > > DeathStar.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Lunekill: DIE YOU PATHETIC VERMON!!!!!!!!!!
> > > > > 
> > > > > DeathStar sees the incoming shots.
> > > > > 
> > > > > DeathStar: Dread, evasive!
> > > > > 
> > > > > The star fighter barral rolls out of the way...
> > > > > 
> > > > > DeathStar: DeathStar, TRANSFORM!
> > > > > 
> > > > > Now in bot mode, DeathStar was ready to defend himself but 
> > their 
> > > > orders were not to engage the enemy under any circumstances.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Rockseeker: Yes, Prime's heirs... Let's just hope no one 
> > figured 
> > > us 
> > > > > out and called for reinforcements yets. Ladies first.
> > > > > 
> > > > > He indicated the south with his hand, ready to follow his 
> > sister 
> > > as 
> > > > > soon as she moved.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > : : Lunekill : :

are

> > > > the 
> > > > > > same continent, but a third one is on the southern

> > > > > > since the recent revolution on Cybertron.

> > > > > > >

> thing 
> > > had 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > be

> > a 
> > > > > threat

> > > > > > > > She remained illusive on the subject, but she knew 
her 
> > > > brother 
> > > > > > > would be clear on what she was talking about.

> > > > > > > >

take 
> > > care 
> > > > of

least,

> > > what

attacked

> > > > > > pesky 
> > > > > > > > > Cybertronians. Yes, even I can surge! The Energon 
> here 
> > is 
> > > > so 
> > > > > > > strong 
> > > > > > > > > that I lost all restraints. Master will like it... 
> Now, 
> > > how

hard 
> > > place.

> > > > > > > > > > so because our Master told me he'd send you to

> > rid 
> > > of 
> > > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > > Cybertronians. Now hurry up and get here!

> > > > > > <roborick007@y...>

> > > > > > > barrier 
> > > > > > > > of

contacted 
> me 
> > > > > > brother.

> > > > I'm

> > > > > make

aching 
> > from 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > > > > injuries 
> > > > > > > > > > he

> > > > > online.

but
